content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello, Juan. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure we can come to an agreement that suits both our needs. Let's discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the size of the apartment and the amenities provided. I'm open to discussing a range that we can both agree on. Would you be willing to start with a lower offer?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Certainly, Juan. I understand that you're looking for a fair price. How about we start with a lower offer and then negotiate from there? What would be a reasonable starting point for you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mister Heine. A reasonable starting point for me would be around 650 Euros per month, considering the size and location of the apartment. Would this be a good starting point for our negotiation?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: 650 Euros per month is an interesting starting point, Juan. It gives us a good foundation for our negotiation. Can you tell me what specific amenities you're looking for in the apartment that might justify this price?
name: Heinrich Heine
